subject: Personal Finance
title: HSA: The Stealth Retirement Account
description: A fast breakdown of HSA: The Stealth Retirement Account for builders.

hook.text: The HSA is the only account that's tax-free going in, growing, AND coming out. Triple tax advantage.

buildup.text: Health Savings Accounts are for people with high-deductible health plans. Contributions are pre-tax.

discovery.text: Unlike FSAs, HSA money rolls over forever. You can invest it and let it grow for decades.

twist.text: After age 65, HSA withdrawals for any purpose are taxed like regular income â€” same as a Traditional IRA.

climax.text: Paying medical costs out-of-pocket now and saving receipts lets your HSA grow tax-free for years.

punchline.text: The best retirement account hides as a health account.

quiz.question: What makes the HSA unique among retirement accounts?
options: It offers a triple tax advantage: deduction, growth, and withdrawal
